title: Randi Rhodes Show - November 25 2013

Sarah Palin says that God Ã¢â‚¬Å“blessedÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ her with a platform on Fox News to defend herself from criticism. Sarah, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not God, thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Rupert Murdoch. But then I know that a lot of conservatives confuse the two.

The Supreme Court is set to take up the question of whether or not corporations have religious rights. How can something have religious rights when they donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have morals or ethics? In a great conversation with Bill Moyers, author Henry Giroux says that modern politics is turning people into zombies. The world of politics is not a good place for a zombie to be. Zombies want to eat brains, and there arenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t a lot of those in politics.
